languages.text: "Пришло время мне вновь облачиться в свою шкуру". {n}Ульфар устало поводит плечами. От его тела исходят жар и звериный запах. Один из слуг открывает ларец с контактным елеем — им надлежит совершить помазание каждого из нейропортов черного панциря, пятнающих кожу Волка. Благодаря этому священному аугменту он сливается воедино со своим доспехом и каждым его фибромускулом.{/n}

"It is time for me to don my skin again." {n}Ulfar shrugs wearily, his body giving off heat and animal scent. One of the servants opens a casket containing contact unguent — it will be used to anoint each of the black carapace's neural ports marring the Wolf's skin. This sacred augmentation seamlessly fuses Ulfar's body with his armour and every fibre bundle of it.{/n}

Благодаря этому священному аугменту он сливается воедино со своим доспехом и каждым его фибромускулом.{/n}

languages.text: “是时候再次披上我的狼皮了。”{n}乌尔法疲惫地耸了耸肩，身体散发着热气与动物的气味。其中一名仆人打开了一个匣子，里面装着油膏。这种油膏可以用来涂抹狼皮上黑色坚甲中每个神经端口，这些神圣的植入端口可以将乌尔法的身体，与他的盔甲及每根纤维束完美地融合在一起。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is time for me to don my skin again." {n}Ulfar shrugs wearily, his body giving off heat and animal scent. One of the servants opens a casket containing contact unguent — it will be used to anoint each of the black carapace's neural ports marring the Wolf's skin. This sacred augmentation seamlessly fuses Ulfar's body with his armour and every fibre bundle of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是时候再次披上我的狼皮了。”{n}乌尔法疲惫地耸了耸肩，身体散发着热气与动物的气味。其中一名仆人打开了一个匣子，里面装着油膏。这种油膏可以用来涂抹狼皮上每颗黑色甲壳中的神经端口，这些神圣的植入端口可以将乌尔法的身体，与他的盔甲及每根纤维束完美地融合在一起。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「また皮をかぶる時間だな」{n}ウルファーは動物の香りと熱を放つ身体で弱々しく肩をすくめる。従者のひとりが箱を開けると接点用軟膏が入っている――狼の肌に損傷を与えている、黒いカラペースの各神経ポートに使われているものだろう。この聖なる増強装置はウルファーの肉体と、アーマー及び全繊維束とを継ぎ目なく一体化させている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is time for me to don my skin again." {n}Ulfar shrugs wearily, his body giving off heat and animal scent. One of the servants opens a casket containing contact unguent — it will be used to anoint each of the black carapace's neural ports marring the Wolf's skin. This sacred augmentation seamlessly fuses Ulfar's body with his armour and every fibre bundle of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「また皮をかぶる時間だな」{n}ウルファーは動物の香りと熱を放つ身体で弱々しく肩をすくめる。従者のひとりが箱を開けると接点用軟膏が入っている――狼の肌に損傷を与えている、黒いカラペースの各神経ポートに使われているものだろう。この聖なる増強装置はウルファーの肉体と、アーマー及び全繊維束とを継ぎ目なく一体化させている。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «Es hora de volver a ponerme la piel». {n}Ulfar, cansado, se encoge de hombros. Su cuerpo exuda calor y olor animal. Uno de los sirvientes abre un joyero que contiene un ungüento que se usará para ungir cada uno de los puertos neurales del caparazón negro que hay en la piel del Lobo. Estos aumentos sagrados unen perfectamente el cuerpo de Ulfar con su armadura y cada fibra de la misma.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is time for me to don my skin again." {n}Ulfar shrugs wearily, his body giving off heat and animal scent. One of the servants opens a casket containing contact unguent — it will be used to anoint each of the black carapace's neural ports marring the Wolf's skin. This sacred augmentation seamlessly fuses Ulfar's body with his armour and every fibre bundle of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es hora de volver a ponerme la piel». {n}Ulfar, cansado, se encoge de hombros. Su cuerpo exuda calor y olor animal. Uno de los sirvientes abre un joyero que contiene un ungüento que se usará para ungir cada uno de los puertos neurales del caparazón negro que hay en la piel del Lobo. Estos aumentos sagrados unen perfectamente el cuerpo de Ulfar con su armadura y cada fibra de la misma.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Il est temps pour moi d'enfiler à nouveau ma seconde peau. » {n}Une odeur animale se dégage du corps brûlant d'Ulfar, qui hausse les épaules d'un air las. L'un des serviteurs ouvre un coffret contenant un onguent de contact utilisé pour oindre chacun des ports neuraux qui constellent sa peau. Cette augmentation sacrée permet de fusionner la moindre fibre du corps d'Ulfar avec son armure.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is time for me to don my skin again." {n}Ulfar shrugs wearily, his body giving off heat and animal scent. One of the servants opens a casket containing contact unguent — it will be used to anoint each of the black carapace's neural ports marring the Wolf's skin. This sacred augmentation seamlessly fuses Ulfar's body with his armour and every fibre bundle of it.{/n}

L'un des serviteurs ouvre un coffret contenant un onguent de contact utilisé pour oindre chacun des ports neuraux qui constellent sa peau. Cette augmentation sacrée permet de fusionner la moindre fibre du corps d'Ulfar avec son armure.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Es ist Zeit, dass ich meine Haut wieder anlege." {n}Ulfar zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern, sein Körper strahlt Wärme und einen animalischen Geruch aus. Einer der Diener öffnet ein Kästchen mit Salbe – damit werden die Neuralports auf der Haut des Wolfs für den schwarzen Panzer eingerieben. Die heilige Augmentation verbindet Ulfars Körper nahtlos mit seiner Rüstung und jedem ihrer Faserbündel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is time for me to don my skin again." {n}Ulfar shrugs wearily, his body giving off heat and animal scent. One of the servants opens a casket containing contact unguent — it will be used to anoint each of the black carapace's neural ports marring the Wolf's skin. This sacred augmentation seamlessly fuses Ulfar's body with his armour and every fibre bundle of it.{/n}

Einer der Diener öffnet ein Kästchen mit Salbe – damit werden die Neuralports auf der Haut des Wolfs für den schwarzen Panzer eingerieben. Die heilige Augmentation verbindet Ulfars Körper nahtlos mit seiner Rüstung und jedem ihrer Faserbündel.{/n}

languages.text: "Derimi giydirme vakti geldi." {n}Bedeninden sıcaklık ve hayvan kokusu yükselen Ulfar, bitkin bir şekilde omuz silkiyor. Hizmetkârlardan biri, içinde kontak özyağı bulunan bir kutuyu açıyor. Bu merhem, Kurt'un cildindeki siyah kabukzırhların nöral kapaklarına sürülecek. Kutsal ogmentasyon, Ulfar'ın bedenini zırhındaki her bir telle birleşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is time for me to don my skin again." {n}Ulfar shrugs wearily, his body giving off heat and animal scent. One of the servants opens a casket containing contact unguent — it will be used to anoint each of the black carapace's neural ports marring the Wolf's skin. This sacred augmentation seamlessly fuses Ulfar's body with his armour and every fibre bundle of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Derimi giyindirme vakti geldi." {n}Ulfar, bitkin bir şekilde omzunu silkiyor, bedeninden sıcaklık ve hayvan kokusu yükseliyor. Hizmetkârlardan biri, içinde temas özyağı bulunan bir kutuyu açıyor. Bu merhem, Kurt'un cildindeki siyah kabukzırhların nöral kapaklarına sürülecek. Bu kutsal ogmentasyon, Ulfar'ın bedenini zırhındaki her bir telle birleştiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
